column5: Anyone staying at Dog Lake Missanabie (Ernie's old camp) We left a deposit last year and have not been able to confirm our arrival for this July. We called all the numbers, emailed and no response. Been over 2 weeks. We even reached out to Algoma Tourism who posts their business into on their site If anyone is staying there or planning to have you been able to reach them? Are they closed? Thanks in advance! EK...

Doesn't sound good with all the fires in Canada. That area isn't in the current high danger area, but I'd be real concerned about going when you can't contact anyone there. Might have been evacuated; hard to know for sure. Start googling everything you can about the situation in that area and see if you can learn anything.
is this the place you are talking about?https://www.doglakeresort.com/contact
did you contact Island view camp ? Maybe they know !
